index_terms: INFORMATION AND REFERRAL SERVICES LAND USE PLANNING
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 3.06.040, 3.12.020, 23.22.052, 23.22.100, 23.24.035, 23.53.010, 23.53.015, 23.53.020, 23.53.025, 23.53.030, 23.71.008, 23.84.032 and 23.84.036, and adding a new Section 23.53.004 to update references to the Right-of-Way Improvements Manual, and clarify Department Director authority to require street improvements associated with development projects.
